PlantForm: Low growing shrub to small tree.
Leaves: Oval shaped to almost round, 3-7 cm long, very shiny dark green, paler below.
Flowers: Dense cluster of white funnel like flowers with 5 petals.
FruitSeeds: Densely clustered berry like 6-8 mm long green to orange-red, glossy.
DistinguishingFeatures: Very shiny leaves and general shape.
